summary: "TAKATA RECALL" I RECEIVED THE NOTICE FROM FORD IN JUNE 2016. I HAVE CONTACTED MY DEALER MANY TIMES OVER THE PAST YEAR AND PARTS ARE STILL UNAVAILABLE. I HAVE A PRETEEN BOY AND HAVE TO CARPOOL FOR SPORTS ACTIVITIES. I CAN NO LONGER HAVE ANYONE SIT IN MY PASSENGER SIDE SEAT. OUR CARS HAVE BEEN KNOWINGLY UNSAFE FOR OVER A YEAR. HOW MANY PEOPLE HAVE TO BE INJURED OR WORSE BEFORE OUR CARS ARE FIXED.
